The MC or button representing the ‘up button’ on the scroller.

The MC or button representing the ‘down button’ on the scroller.

Array containing the coordinants to be used for startDrag()

Functions

scrollCore

function scrollCore()

setUpButn

public function setUpButn(u):Void

Set the scroll up button

Parameters

uButton or MovieClip.  This function will the set the upButn variable, and set the action variable on the Button or MC given.  The reason that this function sets the action variable on the Button or MC given is becasue it will make it easier to create a working scroller when using either the <basicButton> or <toggleButton> classes
